sqlMap.select: SELECT t.ID AS "groupId", t.GROUP_ENAME AS "groupEname", t.GROUP_CNAME AS "groupCname", t.GROUP_TYPE AS "groupType" FROM (SELECT DISTINCT PARENT_ID FROM ${platSchema}.XS_USER_GROUP_MEMBER, (SELECT ${platSchema}.queryParentInfo((SELECT USER_ID FROM ${platSchema}.XS_USER T2 WHERE T2.LOGIN_NAME = #loginName#)) AS ID_SET FROM DUAL) tset WHERE find_in_set(parent_id, ID_SET)) TEMP, ${platSchema}.XS_USER_GROUP t WHERE t.ID = TEMP.PARENT_ID AND t.GROUP_TYPE = #groupType#
